#Enter your code here

import math
def prime(n):
    count=0
    while(n%2==0):
        count+=1
        n/=2
    for i in range(3,int(math.sqrt(n))+1,1):
        while (n%i==0):
            count+=1
            n/=i
    if n>2:
        count+=1
    return count
t=int(raw_input())
for i in xrange(t):
    n=int(raw_input())
    print prime(n)
